DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is assessing the prevalence of aspirin resistance in a cohort of diabetic patients. Those found resistant has been undergone pharmacological tests using different drug formulations to investigate the reversibility of aspirin resistance.
DOC.brief_title: Aspirin Resistance Reversibility in Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: diabete mellitus type 2 asa since 30 days at least plts >150000 and <450000 recent ACS (within 30 days) anticoagulant therapy haemorragic diathesis
